AFTER:
h = graph.ndata['f']
        h_in = h
        graph.update_all(message_func=self.message_function, reduce_func=fn.sum(msg='m', out='m_sum'))
        h = torch.cat([h, graph.ndata['m_sum']], dim=-1)

            h = h + h_in
        graph.ndata['f'] = h
